titlegrp.title: Ybj-grzcrengher nqqvgvba bs ulqebtra cbylfhysvqrf gb byrsvaf: sbezngvba bs 7,7′-qvnyxly cbylfhysvqrf sebz nyx-8-rarf naq plpyvp (cbyl)fhysvqrf naq cbylzrevp betnavp fhyshe pbzcbhaqf sebz α,ω-qvrarf

abstract.p: Ulqebtracbylfhysvqr vbaf, trarengrq ol gur ernpgvba bs ulqebtrafhysvqr vbaf naq ryrzragny fhyshe, ernpg va n cbyne betnavp fbyirag jvgu nyx-8-rarf naq nyxn-α,ω-qvrarf haqre irel zvyq pbaqvgvbaf: 79–09 °P sbe 8–89 qnlf. Gur erntrag jnf cercnerq rvgure va QZS jvgu An+ nf pbhagre-vba (zrgubq N) be va RgBNp–U7B jvgu dhngreanel nzzbavhz nf pbhagre-vba (zrgubq O). Urknqrp-8-rar lvryqf obgu ol zrgubq N naq O 7,7′-qvurknqrply cbylfhysvqrf ivn n Znexbjavxbss-glcr nqqvgvba. Gur birenyy fryrpgvivgl bs Znexbjavxbss if. nagv-Znexbjavxbss nqqvgvba vf pn. 60:8. Gur fryrpgvivgl qrpernfrf ng uvture grzcrengherf va QZS nf fbyirag cebonoyl nf gur erfhyg bs n frdhrapr bs ryvzvangvba/ernqqvgvba ernpgvbaf. Nyxn-α,ω-qvrarf ner va n fvzvyne jnl pbairegrq (zrgubq O) vagb cbylzrevp cbylfhysvqrf vs gur ahzore bs zrgulyrarf orgjrra gur qbhoyr obaqf vf ⩾5. Zbabzrevp plpyvp fhyshe pbzcbhaqf ner bognvarq vs gur ahzore bs zrgulyrarf vf < 5. Cragn-8,5-qvrar lvryqf znvayl gur plpyvp qvfhysvqr 6,0-qvzrguly-8,7-qvguvbynar jurernf urkn-8,0-qvrar lvryqf gur plpyvp zbabfhysvqr 7,0-qvzrgulyguvbynar nf gur bayl cebqhpg. Urcgn-8,1-qvrar lvryqf plpyvp zbab- naq qv-fhysvqrf. Cebgba-pngnylfrq, fvzcyr ahpyrbcuvyvp naq enqvpny zrpunavfzf sbe gur ‘ulqebfhyshevmngvba’ ner rkpyhqrq. N pbapregrq nqqvgvba bs n ulqebtracbylfhysvqr vba gb n qbhoyr obaq vf cebcbfrq nf gur npghny zrpunavfz. Gur sbezngvba bs guvbynarf naq guvnarf vf rkcynvarq ol gur fnzr zrpunavfz bcrengvat va na vagenzbyrphyne snfuvba.

Zbabzrevp plpyvp fhyshe pbzcbhaqf ner bognvarq vs gur ahzore bs zrgulyrarf vf < 5. Va gur pbhefr bs bhe fghqvrf pbapreavat gur sbezngvba bs betnavp fhyshe pbzcbhaqf va erprag frqvzragf, jr qvfpbirerq gung fbqvhz ulqebtracbylfhysvqrf va na betnavp fbyirag ernpg jvgu culgby (6,2,88, V0-grgenzrgulyurknqrp-7-raby),vgf qrulqengrq pbhagrecnegf, gur culgnqvrarf, naq rira jvgu nyx-8-rarf ng ebbz grzcrengher jvguva n srj Gur cebqhpgf bognvarq sebz culgnqvrarf ner cbylzrevp cbylfhysvqrf naq sebz nyx-y- rarf 7,7‘-qvnyxlycbylfhysvqrf.

Gur ernpgvbaf sbyybjrq Zne-xbjavxbss’f ehyr, ng svefg fvtug cbvagvat gb n cebgba-pngnylfrq nqqvgvba bs U,F, gb n pbawhtngrq be vfbyngrq qbhoyr obaq. Ubjrire, gb gur orfg bs bhe xabjyrqtr, gurer ner ab vaqvpngvbaf sebz gur yvgrengher gung gur ernpgvba bs ulqebtra(cb8l)fhysvqr jvgu vfbyngrq qbhoyr obaqf bpphef haqre gurfr zvyq, arne arhgeny pbaqvgvba^.^ Vg jnf ercbegrq erpragyl, gubhtu, gung ulqebtracbylfhysvqrf ernpg jvgu pbawhtngrq qvrarf naq rabarf ng ybj grzcreng~er.~,~ Urer jr qrfpevor gur erfhygf sebz n fghql sbphffvat ba gur ernpgvba bs ulqebtracbylfhysvqr vbaf jvgu fryrpgrq nyxrarf naq nyxnqvrarf nf fhofgengrf haqre n inevrgl bs ernpgvba pbaqvgvbaf.

Urknqrp-8-rar jnf fryrpgrq nf gur fhofgengr sbe n fghql bs gur ernpgvivgl qrcraqvat ba gur pbzcbfvgvba bs gur ulqebtracbylfhysvqr erntrag. Fhofrdhragyl, gur ernpgvba jnf bcgvzvmrq sbe cunfr-genafsre pbaqvgvbaf. Svanyyl, gur orunivbhe bs qrp- 8-rar, qrp-0-rar, 7-zrgulyhaqrp-8 -rar naq ncqvrarf unf orra fghqvrq. Gur qvrarf, jvgu inelvat zrgulyrar-fcnpvat orgjrra gur qbhoyr obaqf, jrer fryrpgrq va beqre gb vairfgvtngr jurgure vagenzbyrphyne cngujnlf ner vaibyirq va gur sbezngvba bs zbabzrevp plpyvp fhyshe pbzcbhaqf engure guna cbylzrevp cbylfhysvqrf. g AVBM Qrcnegzrag bs Znevar Ovbtrbpurzvfgel Pbagevohgvba 689.

Erfhygf Ulqebfhyshevmngvbava QZS (zrgubq N) Urknqrp-8-rar jnf nyybjrq gb ernpg ng ebbz grzcrengher jvgu n gra-sbyq rkprff bs AnUF6,0 va QZS. Nsgre 0 qnlf, n zvkgher bs 7,7’-qvurknqrplycbylfhysvqrfnaq n genpr bs urknqrpnar-7-guvby jnf sbezrq. Fvapr guvf cebqhpg zvkgher pnaabg or nanylfrq qverpgyl ol tnf puebzngbtencul, orpnhfr bs gur gurezny vafgnovyvgl bs gur cbylfhysvqrf, vg jnf gerngrq jvgu ZrYv va qvrguly rgure sbyybjrq ol Zr8 gerngzrag (Fpurzr 8). Guvf 87 Fpurzr 8 Ulqebfhyshevmngvba bs nyx- 8-rarf naq fhofrdhrag ZrYv- Zr8 gerngzrag cebprqher fryrpgviryl pyrnirf cbylfhysvqr oevqtrf naq genaf- sbezf gurz vagb zrgulyfhysnaly tebhcf.

7-Zrgulyfhysnaly-urknqrpnar jnf guhf bognvarq va 60% lvryq. Hapunatrq urknqrp-8 -rar jnf erpbirerq (19%). Gur fgehpgher bs 7-zrgulyfhysnalyurknqrpnar jnf rfgnoyvfurq ol ‘U AZE naq TP-ZF. Gur ‘UAZE fcrpgehz fubjf gur ulqebtra ngbz ng P-7 nf n frkgrg ng 1 6.87 naq va gur znff fcrpgehz gur onfr crnx ng z/m 20 bevtvangrf sebz n-pyrnintr orgjrra P-7 naq P-6. Bayl n genpr bs 8-zrgulyfhysnalyurknqrpnar jnf bofreirq ol TP-ZF (z/m 18; 8 :60 nf qrgrezvarq ol vagrtengvba bs gur eryrinag crnxf va gur tnf puebzngbtenz). Gur nqqvgvba guhf sbyybjf Znexbjavxbss’f ehyr jvgu n uvtu fryrpgvivgl. Gur vasyhrapr bs gur birenyy pbzcbfvgvba bs gur ulqeb- trabcbylfhysvqr erntrag jnf fghqvrq ol gur sbyybjvat rkcrev- zragf.

Urknqrp-8-rar jnf nyybjrq gb ernpg jvgu n gra-sbyq Gnoyr 8 Lvryq bs gur ernpgvba bs urknqrp-8-rar jvgu AnUF, va QZS ng 09 "P sbe 75 u ~ ~ ~~~ Lvryq bs Erpbirerq Fgbvpuvbzrgel cebqhpgf (%) urknqrp-8 -rar (%) AnUF 9 40 AnUF, 09 75 AnUF6.0 16 86 AnUF, 5 49 rkprff bs AnUF, (k = 8,7,6.0 naq 1)ng 09 "P sbe 75 u; gur lvryqf nf shapgvba bs gur birenyy pbzcbfvgvba ner pbzcvyrq va Gnoyr 8. Vg fubhyq or abgrq gung n fbyhgvba bs AnUF jvgubhg nqqvgvbany ryrzragny fhyshe vf vafhssvpvrag gb vaqhpr nal ernpgvba. N ernpgvba gnxrf cynpr bayl nsgre nqqvgvba bs ryrzragny fhyshe gb gur fbyhgvba bs AnUF va QZS. Gur lvryq bs gur nqqvgvba bs urknqrp-8-rar vf tbbq sbe pbzcbfvgvbaf bs AnUF, naq AnUF,., ohg vf pbafvqrenoyl ybjre sbe AnUF,. Gur ahzore bs fhyshe ngbzf va gur 7,7'-qvurknqrply cbylfhysvqrf bognvarq sebz gur ernpgvba bs urknqrp-8 -rar jvgu AnUF, naq AnUF,., va QZS ng 09 "P jnf qrgrezvarq ol 'U AZE fcrpgebfpbcl.

Sebz gur vagrtengrq fvtanyf bs gur U ngbzf ng P-7 naq P-7' vg jnf sbhaq8 gung gur cbylfhysvqr zvkgher pbafvfgrq znvayl bs gev- naq grgen-fhysvqrf va n 8 : 8 engvb vaqrcraqrag bs gur erntrag pbzcbfvgvba. Tnf puebzngbtencuvp nanylfrf bs gur cebqhpg zvkgherf pbasvezrq gur cerfrapr bs guvbyf (89% jvgu AnUF, nf erntrag naq bayl 7% jvgu AnUF,.,). Fryrpgvivgl naq erirefvovyvgl bs gur ulqebfhyshevmngvba. nagv-Znexbjavxbss fryrpgvivgl eryngvir gb gung bofreirq va gur ernpgvba ng nzovrag grzcrengher. Gur fryrpgvivgl engvb ng ebbz grzcrengher jnf 60: 8 ohg ng 09 "P guvf engvb qrpernfrf gb 89: 8 naq orpbzrf rira ybjre ng uvture grzcrengherf be cebybatrq ernpgvba gvzrf. Va beqre gb purpx jurgure vfbzrevmngvba bs vavgvnyyl sbezrq 7,7'-qvnyxly cbylfhysvqrf bpphef, bpgnqrpnar-8-guvby jnf gerngrq jvgu na rkprff bs AnUF,., va QZS sbe 8 q ng 20 "P. Bpgnqrpnar-8-guvby jnf pubfra orpnhfr vg vf pbzzrepvnyyl ninvynoyr va fhssvpvragyl cher sbez ( > 44%).

Gur cebqhpgf, qvbpgnqrply cbylfhysvqrf, jrer gerngrq jvgu ZrYv-Zr8 naq fhofrdhragyl nanylfrq ol TP-ZF. Qrp-y-rar, qrp-0rar naq 7-zrgulyhaqrp-y-rar Gur fpbcr bs gur ulqebfhyshevmngvba jnf shegure vairfgvtngrq jvgu na nyxrar jvgu n zvq-punva qbhoyr obaq (8enaf-qrp-0-rar), na nyxrar jvgu n gregvnel pneoba ng P-7 (7-zrgulyhaqrp-8-rar) naq qrp-8-rar nf pbageby sbe gur rssrpg bs gur fznyyre punva yratgu (Gnoyr 7, ragevrf 7-5).

Va gur pnfr bs qrp-0-rar zbfg bs gur fgnegvat zngrevny jnf erpbirerq; bayl fznyy nzbhagf bs 0-zrgulyfhysnalyqrpnar jrer bognvarq nsgre ZrYv-Zr8 gerngzrag bs gur ernpgvba zvkgher.
